data.title: Icon
data.subtitle: Android | Google Play
data.description: A set of icons according to the official guidelines required to publish an app on Google Play. Each folder contains a PSD and some PNG files to show the default usage. It must be customized to get the final output for a project

data.title: Graphics
data.subtitle: Android | Google Play
data.description: A collection of resources required to publish an app on Google Play. It is divided into various folders according to its purpose. Each folder contains a PSD and some PNG files to show the default usage. It must be customized to get the final output for a project.
